verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: rodney berget] [V: asks] [ARG1: to withdraw execution appeal convicted killer and death row inmate rodney] berget sent a letter to a judge in august requesting to withdraw his death penalty appeal despite the wishes of his attorneys eric shulte berget eric robert marty jackley rodney berget judge hoffman lynette johnson
